column4: Guys, i have a doubt. How can I do a SCANDISK in my windows partition? ( ps: But, i would like to do it just in my LINUX.)
if it's FAT32, fsck.vfat /dev/sdXY (where sdXY is the Windows partition)
Man, i have installed here the ntfs-3g tools, right? But, what i need for do my scan in windows?
